column4: A room assigned to one person. Has one bed.
A room assigned to two people. Has one bed.
A room with a queen sized bed. May be occupied by one or more people.
A room with a king sized bed. May be occupied by one or more people.
A room with two twin beds. May be occupied by one or more people.
A room with two double beds. May be occupied by one or more people.
A room with two queen beds. May be occupied by one or more people.
A parlour or living room connected with to one or more bedrooms.
